channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan's Brown Dippers Face More Predator Attacks With Changing Climate
item.description: For the past seven years, Taiwan's brown dipper songbird population has been under threat due to fewer typhoons. The storms help to maintain predator populations and vegetation in

item.title: Among European Art Masters: Inside the National Gallery, London's Taiwan Debut
item.description: Renowned paintings spanning 400 years of Western art history from the National Gallery, London are on display in Taiwan for the first time. TaiwanPlus gets an inside look.

item.title: U.S. and Taiwan Navies Conduct 'Unplanned' Military Drills
item.description: Reuters news agency is reporting that the U.S. and Taiwan conducted drills involving "multiple military assets," including frigates and supply vessels.

item.title: Fake Bank Notes Circulate in Southern Taiwan
item.description: Multiple shops in southern Taiwan's Kaohsiung City have been been finding poorly made counterfeit NT$100 and NT$500 bank notes in their tills. Police have apprehended a suspected p
